title: Walkaway prices
creator_credit: Jack Zalkalns and Tasmanian Film Corporation
brief_description: A dramatized re-enactment of an adolescent boy’s increasing involvement in petty theft and vandalism due to the peer pressure exerted on him by two other boys. His fears of being detected are eventually borne out when two detectives appear at the school and ask to see him. Cast includes: Robert Clarkson, Dam Suitable for lower and middle secondary levels.
